normalised: social media and influencer marketing: level up your gram game with follower analytics!

unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Level Up Your Gram Game with Follower Analytics!**
normalised: want to become the next bhuvan bam or prajakta koli? stop scrolling endlessly and start analyzing! new analytics tools are popping up faster than diyas at diwali, and they are a game changer.

unnormalised: Want to become the next Bhuvan Bam or Prajakta Koli? Stop scrolling endlessly and start *analyzing*! New analytics tools are popping up faster than diyas at Diwali, and they’re a game-changer.
normalised: forget just counting likes, we are talking deep dives! find out what time your delhi based followers are most active, or which hashtags are getting you noticed from kerala to kolkata. see if your biryani recipe posts are attracting more foodies than your O O T D pics.

unnormalised: Forget just counting likes, we're talking deep dives! Find out what time your Delhi-based followers are most active, or which hashtags are getting you noticed from Kerala to Kolkata. See if your biryani recipe posts are attracting more foodies than your OOTD pics.
normalised: these tools let you understand audience demographics, engagement rates, and even track competitor strategies. apps like "social samosa insights" and "kulfi analytics" are making it easier and cheaper than ever.

unnormalised: These tools let you understand audience demographics, engagement rates, and even track competitor strategies. Apps like "SocialSamosa Insights" and "Kulfi Analytics" are making it easier (and cheaper!) than ever.
normalised: don't just throw content at the wall and hope it sticks. use follower analytics to create content that resonates, boosts engagement, and ultimately grows your influence. this onam, give your marketing strategy a fresh start! because let us be real, who doesn't want more followers? and potentially, endorsement deals worth lakhs of rupees!

unnormalised: Don’t just throw content at the wall and hope it sticks. Use follower analytics to create content that resonates, boosts engagement, and ultimately grows your influence. This Onam, give your marketing strategy a fresh start! Because let's be real, who doesn't want more followers? And potentially, endorsement deals worth lakhs of Rs.!
